dc_title_s: Encroachment Locations for Oil & Gas: Pennsylvania, 2018
dc_description_s: An Encroachment Location for Oil & Gas is a DEP primary facility type related to the Oil and Gas Program. The sub-facilities that fall under Oil and Gas Encroachment also exist under Encroachment Locations. The difference is in the DEP program that regulates the facilities. Sub Facility types include: Bridge--- A bridge across a stream required to provide access primarily to an oil and gas location Culvert--- A culvert installed to provide access primarily to an oil and gas location
